phrases: You are going to make me drunk without even drinking anything.
So, did you find out anything?
Everything is starting to add up.
The new Oracion Seis is responsible for the serial destruction of those churches.
In some of the churches that they attacked,
there were signs that someone had been taking shelter there.
there is no record of them in any of Zentopia's documents.
At first, I thought they were corpses...
It must be some kind of suspended animation.
and the underground organization that exists among some of the local parishes...
Something is happening there that involves whoever had been secretly harbored.
And we need to find out the identity of that person?
So you are the one called Angel?
Another one of the Six Generals?
I am Legion's number one lancer, Dan Straight!
I was devoted to Lu-tan, but now I am devoted to Ange-pon!
I should tell you, I am devoted to Laxus.
What are you two competing for?!
Where did you put the Infinity Clock?!
Although that shadow by her eye is disquieting...
I summon Shamsiel, angel of sunlight!
What the hell did you come here for?!
An angel's sun rays are bright!
Be destroyed by your own voice.
There is something I want to ask you.
What are you convinced about, asshole?!
This guy can hear people's thoughts.
Is not that a mild form of sexual harassment?!
I have no more use for you.
That was not only Listening Magic!
He absorbed sound, amplified it, and fired it.
You are thinking it will mitigate my sound attack enough for you to strike a blow.
You did not defeat Grimoire's Azuma for nothing.
If I recall correctly, Natsu beat this guy by attacking without thinking and a loud voice.
That will not work on me now.
The curate went out on our behalf yesterday.
I am Lahar, the Captain of the Enforcement and Detention Corps of the Magic Council.
I am here on an investigation.
She would probably look like this now.
You left yourself wide open, little girl.
human strength and grit are very easily mowed down.
Even though you might have had a chance of winning by abandoning him...
Sometimes the courage to leave a comrade is necessary!
I will never abandon a friend!
Is there something you want to say?
You have been staring at me.
Is a Celestial Wizard so unusual?
You remind me of someone I knew.
Who are you calling flat as an ironing board?!
N-No, I am the one who owes you an apology.
So, I remind you of a girl?
If I had done things differently then...
Even though she died years ago, you still care about her...
I do not have anyone like that...
No, even if I did, 100 years is...
One church after another was attacked,
and most of my friends had passed on.
What do you mean by given up?
So I thought I would at least
remember even a little of this age's landscape...
Are you the one who is been given shelter by this church?
Already, there is not a moment to waste.
News of the archbishop's madness has begun to leak to the outside world.
We must elect the next archbishop with all due haste and hold the inauguration...
Now more than ever, with Zentopia's secret techniques being lost,
will be the only support for the confused, powerless lambs.
Replacing the archbishop at this late date would change nothing.
The end is in our grasp...
Take this girl and get away!
Let us leave this to him.
There is no need to worry.
Despite appearances, he is quite skilled.
I have thrown away a lot...
Let us have a showdown to see who is faster!
But this are not over yet!
He moves so fast that it is easy to be fooled...
And if that is true, if I surround him with my even simpler Direct Line,
The blank of the last seven years I have spent drinking is kicking my ass!
No one can catch up to me.
I do not need any memories!
Do not say anything to me!
His memories are trying to come back, while some kind of force is resisting it.
Right now, it looks like you are going to be crushed by your own memories!
If I could restore his memories with my Healing Magic...
It is your fault, little girl!
You are in over your head!
Jeez, how pathetic can you get?!
Is this the kind of strength that I wished for?
Something came out of his soul.
I hurt someone with my power of healing?
What the new Oracion Seis is after
is the destruction of regional churches, and the Anti-Link, which you have seen.
Ever since the formation of Zentopia,
there is been a secret underground organization operating from within.
We Neville Celestial Wizards have been sheltered by them.
The Celestial Wizard and author of Key of the Starry Heavens?
We are the descendants of Will Neville's disciples.
And at the same time, there is also a biological link to a certain something.
As long as we live, we have to protect it.
But they are also an abominable curse.
What is it you are protecting?
And the victims up to now...
They are neither alive nor dead.
I am going to activate the Anti-Link amplitude limiter.
This is the end of me...
Not a bad job, being able to sleep for eternity in this moldy underground lair.
However, there are not many of your disciples left.
There is no need for concern.
I will accept all of the nightmare that you saw.
I am more worried about you, after fighting him...
I do not know what the hell happened...
It seems that when the Anti-Link was activated, the biological link was severed.
At the same time, though, it seems all of your magic has disappeared.
Tell that to everyone else, too!
It will not be 100 years from now.
I am sure we will be able to meet again sometime.
I could not pick up most of it,
but he said thank you to you too, and Get your paws off of her!
So you are no longer a Celestial Wizard.
It looks like I could not protect you in the end.
thanks to no one but you.
You too, live for the present.
Letting yourself forever be caught up in the past
only results in missing opportunities to learn important things, Mest.
Break loose from the past and learn with your own eyes and ears that they are safe.
That is the beginning of your new path.
I have a strange feeling that something is out of place, too.
I have not even been able to land one punch!
And he wants us to attack him head on?!
This feeling that something is wrong...
It is like Cana's divinations are backfiring...
From the front or back, I am going to beat the crap outta you!
Zentopia was after the hand of the Infinity Clock
But in the end, both we and Legion
were totally trashed by the new Oracion Seis.
In fact, I can do this all day, asshole!
I am going to take you apart, I guarantee it!
It has nothing to do with whether we have good battle chemistry or not!
I feel like we are overlooking something that is incredibly important.
It seems we have hit a dead end...
And what is she doing hidden down here?
After a major accident several years ago, it seems she was receiving treatment here.
But even if she recovers, this lacrima is designed to keep her in a comatose state.
Meaning that if she woke up, it would be inconvenient for someone?
She lost her family in an accident at the Lobster Plantation.
Then who the hell is that with Lucy?!
That must mean it is lunchtime!
Then let us go out to eat somewhere, Lucy's treat!
Hey, there is a giant fish flying through the air!
Then that will be our lunch!
I wonder if we can eat that...
If you are fired up, you can eat most things, right?
That obviously looks like it would be tough to chew...
